text: Surface 3 is a 2-1 detachable developed by Microsoft. It was released on 5 May 2015. It runs version like Windows 8.1 or Windows 10. == Reviews == Wired reviewing the Surface 3, it has good reviews such as lovely, very good design, Surface Type Cover is a enjoyful and smart, it runs Windows versions with full features and replaces both tablet and laptop. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Microsoft Surface
title: Surface 3
